Projects Project Title: Predictive Maintenance Client: ITC Infptech Nature of Employment: Full Time Duration: Aug 2019 - Nov 2019 Project Location: Bangalore Onsite / Offsite: Offsite Role: Other Project Details: Aim of the project was to notify the health status of various hard drives in an organization to the support team thereby helping them to take required actions.Aim was accomplished by analyzing the daily sensor report collected from hard drives and then making use of various classification algorithms to predict the health status.
Project Title: Video Game Market Analysis Client: As part of PG Programme Nature of Employment: Full Time Duration: Apr 2019 - May 2019

Project Location: Bangalore Onsite / Offsite: Offsite Role: Other Team Size: 4 Skill Used: Power Bi, Tableau, Advanced Excel, Project Details: Data visualization project done in Tableau.We were having the details of video games released from year 1980 to 2016 .A dashboard which shows the various trends and result of those trends in video game market along with details that will be useful for game enthusiasts and developers was created in Tableau.
Project Title: Global Terrorism Client: As a part of PG Program Nature of Employment: Full Time Duration: Jan 2019 - Feb 2019 Project Location: Bangalore Onsite / Offsite: Offsite Role: Other Team Size: 2 Skill Used: Python, Power Bi, Tableau Project Details: The Global Terrorism Database is an open-source database including information on terrorist attacks around the world.Our aim was to filter and visualize the records of various incidents happened by using Python libraries such as Python, Numpy, Seaborn and Matplotlib.
